Suspend/Resume Process
Inject DLL via:
	ThreadEx.Hijack
	LoadLibraryA/CreateRemoteThread
	Manual Map
	Managed dll inject
	SetWindowsHookEx (hijack native process)

	Internal.dll?
proc.MapFunction
